line_1: Dropping Manilla sauces on his curls:
line_2: Around his head a roasted gander whirls,

line_1: And lost to sight, in dying murmurs curls.
line_2: And wantons with the wind in rapid whirls:

line_1: Her beryl locks, and parts the waving curls,
line_2: O'er her fair brow her pearly comb unfurls
